synopsis.text: Fairy Queen's beloved friend Melody, a talented music fairy from the Music Castle, has mysteriously vanished. Determined to help, a group of friends, consisting of Sally, Maggie, Michelle, and Beibei (or Shirley, Maggie, Michelle, and Emma), embark on a thrilling adventure. Along the way, they cross paths with nine enigmatic musical magicians and engage in a fierce battle against the sinister musical witch Voiceless. As the journey unfolds, the friends begin to suspect that Melody's disappearance is linked to a dark power lurking behind the scenes. What secrets await them as they delve deeper into the world of music and magic? Join the friends on their quest to uncover the truth and save Melody!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
